title: Weland, Smith of the Riddermark (4U295)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Rohan
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Ally • Home 4T • Man
Strength:	4
Vitality:	2
Site:	4T
Game Text:	Villager. Discard Weland if an opponent controls his home site. Fellowship: Exert Weland to heal a mounted companion.
Lore:	A tender of horses, Weland found much work at Helm's Deep.
Rarity:	U
